Sentences: Been a while since I've seen you!
The entire town was here yesterday...
I've heard you've got something for me?
But you got to do something for me before I can give it to you.
Go talk to more than two and less than four people in the village to come and find me.
I need some hands with moving.
WE DO NOT SAY THAT WORD HERE!!!
I literally don't have time for fetch quests right now.
Fine, go come see me after you get Camel back then.
